Home > Data > Magic schools > Mind

Mind

The elemental magic of mind focuses on the manipulation of thoughts, emotions, and consciousness. Direct removal of agency viewed as moral violation.

Properties

FocusMental & Consciousness manipulation, Telepathy, Illusion, Memory
RegulationMind Control and Memory Manipulation heavily regulated or illegal in many areas
